alert.note: Alert for Caswell (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 7:13PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Caswell County through 745 PM EDT... At 712 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Camp Springs, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Yanceyville... Jericho... Camp Springs... Blanch... Leasburg... Hamer... and Topnot. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
